body.name: COOFANDY Mens Casual Cotton Linen Shirt Short Sleeve Button Up Shirts Summer Beach Top
features: Fabric type 100% Cotton with Linen Texture
[Breathable Fabric] Mens summer shirts are made of high quality cotton fabric. Soft to the touch, skin-friendly, lightweight and airy, it feels cool to wear on hot days.
[Regular Fit] Mens cotton linen shirt with textured fabric, features a cuban collar, coconut buttons, and left chest patch pocket. Simple and elegant appearance, suitable for all-day wear.
[Shirt Matching] Mens casual shirts short sleeve are a versatile item. Pair with shorts and sandals to create a casual look, or wear it as a dress shirt with suit pants for a business look.

[Various Occasions] Mens button down short sleeve shirt can be dressy or casual. It's a great choice for daily wear, date, holiday, party, beach, wedding, vacation, travel, vacation, tropical, islands, cruises, etc.
[Warm Tips] Machine wash cold, hang to dry or dry on low. Please check the size chart before purchasing. Wish you a happy shopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas gift - for my father
reviews.reviewText: We go on a lot of cruises, it’s our family vacation so my dad always needs “cruise wear” and he liked this shirt and the color, even for a dinner night on the ship or something like that. I originally bought his correct size which is a Large & it did not fit his chest/shoulder area, it would have been too tight. I returned the Large and reordered him a X large and it fit fine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, good-looking shirt
reviews.reviewText: WHAT I LIKE - It looks good. Great for casual or semi-formal business wear. - It fits well, true to size. I used to get XL shirts for the length (Larges tended to be too short), but I got a Large and it fits comfortably with a good length. Not too tight. - It's very comfortable. The shirt is light and breathable, and I really like the linen texture. It gives it a little character over plain cotton. - The coconut buttons add a nice touch of color to the khaki.WHAT I DIDN'T LIKE - While most of it seems to be well made, there were a couple spots where the stitching was coming apart. - Being cotton/linen it does tend to wrinkle pretty bad. I had just finished ironing it, bent to tie my shoes and came up with a bunch of creases.Overall, I like the shirt a lot and will wear it regularly. Just be sure to wash it in cold water and hang-dry for best results and longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First, I’m a sucker for cotton and/or linen shirts, I probably own way too many. There is nothing better year round in south Florida where I’ve been stuck for a while. This shirt is designed with a spread collar giving it a casual 50’s look and worn with the shirt tail out, which neatly covers my pandemic pounds. It’s not a loose fitting shirt but not tailored tight. The fit is true to size although since it’s 100% cotton/linen it’s going to shrink slightly if you put it in a hot dryer. I’m wearing a large and I’m 5’8” and 190#. There really isn’t anywhere in Florida that I can’t wear this shirt, from the beach to some very nice restaurants. I got the dark blue and it appears colorfast even when washed in hot water. Great shirt for the price, I ‘d certainly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good linen shirt
reviews.reviewText: The main problem with linen shirts is they are best when they a just basic and this shirt is definitely just basic. The color is a basic green, the cut is a basic cut. But that is what makes it very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this shirt for my husband to take on a vacation to Miami. I thought it looked like a perfect beachy shirt to wear out to casual dinners. You should know that it is not a linen shirt, but rather a 100% cotton one. My husband is in between an L and an XL, but I tend to buy larger from Amazon, but the XL is a little too tight for comfort. I’m worried that washing it will make it unwearable for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Tropical Top with Cuban Collar – Crisp, Cool and Comfortable Cotton Linen
reviews.reviewText: The Coofandy Casual Cotton Linen shirt may just be my new favorite shirt. The Cuban collar is straight up Floridian like me. The linen type weave cotton fabric is super crisp, cool and comfortable. The cloth comes out of the wash with a casual look that nicely lands just short of needing an iron.The profile of the garment has a gentle taper in from the chest to the waist that keeps it from looking blousy. The straight hem makes it look super either untucked or tucked. The picture shows a medium on my 5’11”, 150 pound, 40” chest frame.This is a 5 star piece all the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little small
reviews.reviewText: This fits my husband a little tight and he is always a tried and true XXL. I am worried about washing it and shrinking it even more, so I will just hang it to dry and iron it well. Hoping he can lose a little weight (as is our new years resolution) so it fits even better. If you plan on getting this shirt, size up! The color is pretty and the shirt itself is lovely, just wish it was actually a true XXL.
